Menu.buildMarkingMenu¶

Menu.buildMarkingMenu(menu, parent)¶

This is where all the elements of the marking menu our built.

Parameters

  • menu (cmds.popupMenu) – popupMenu to parent item to

  • parent – Declared for maya
